sentences.sContent: It will be clearer if you delete the last paragraph.
sentences.sContent_eng: It will be clearer if you delete the last paragraph.
sentences.sCn: 如果你删去最后那一段，它将会更清楚。

sentences.sContent: These concepts will become clearer in the next section.
sentences.sContent_eng: These concepts will become clearer in the next section.
sentences.sCn: 这些概念在下一节将变得更清楚。

sentences.sContent: But, if you are one of those looking to improve their eyesight in this way, at least you can now do so with a decidedly clearer view!
sentences.sContent_eng: But, if you are one of those looking to improve their eyesight in this way, at least you can now do so with a decidedly clearer view!
sentences.sCn: 但是如果你是指望用这种方式来改善视力的人之一，至少你现在有了更清楚更确切的看法：懂得看门道了！
